conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a genuine 3D cutaway/isometric interior with visible wall height/thickness and multiple faces per wall.

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of distinct rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are not represented in the 3D model (e.g., multiple bedrooms/toilets, dress area, utility/servant room, balconies, and several partitions are missing or heavily merged).

summary: Although the second image is a true 3D cutaway, it omits/merges a majority of the 2D plan’s rooms and partitions, failing layout fidelity requirements.
